name: Magnit Global
description: Magnit™ (formerly PRO Unlimited) is a global leader and pioneer in contingent workforce management. Our industry-leading Integrated Workforce Management (IWM) platform is supported by 30+ years of innovation, modern software, proven expertise, and world-class data and intelligence. It enables companies to optimize talent and diversity goals while achieving operational and financial success. With Magnit, companies can adapt quickly to the evolution of work to grow their extended workforce with greater agility, transparency, and speed.
business_objectives: Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees
Headline: A Single, Integrated Platform of High-Touch Services and Innovative Technology Solutions
ShortDescription: Magnit™ (formerly PRO Unlimited) is a global leader and pioneer in contingent workforce management. Our industry-leading Integrated Workforce Management (IWM) platform is supported by 30+ years of innovation, modern software, proven expertise,

Highlights.name: Globally Recognized with Local Expertise:
Highlights.description: Magnit Global operates as a global force with a local presence [5]. This means they have the reach to find qualified talent across the globe, while still understanding the specific needs and regulations of different regions [1].

Highlights.name: Focus on Optimizing Talent and Cost Efficiency:
Highlights.description: Magnit Global's platform helps companies optimize their talent acquisition by offering a wider pool of qualified candidates, including temporary, contract, and freelance workers [1]. This can lead to cost savings by finding the right talent at the right price, while also allowing companies to scale their workforce up or down as needed [1].

Highlights.name: Leading Provider of Integrated Workforce Management (IWM)
Highlights.description: Magnit Global offers a comprehensive IWM platform that streamlines how businesses manage their contingent workforce [1]. This platform goes beyond just basic recruitment and includes features such as: * Vendor Management System (VMS),Third-Party Payrolling and DEI.

enhanced_description: Magnit™ (formerly PRO Unlimited) is a global leader and pioneer in contingent workforce management, offering an industry-leading Integrated Workforce Management (IWM) platform. Backed by over 30 years of innovation, modern software, proven expertise, and world-class data and intelligence, this single, integrated platform combines high-touch services and innovative technology solutions. Magnit enables companies to optimize talent and diversity goals, achieve operational and financial success, and adapt quickly to the evolution of work. The platform helps grow extended workforces, including temporary, contract, and freelance workers, with greater agility, transparency, and speed. Key components of the IWM platform include a Vendor Management System (VMS), Third-Party Payrolling, and Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion (DEI) capabilities. Magnit is globally recognized for its reach in finding qualified talent worldwide, while maintaining local expertise to understand specific regional needs and regulations. It focuses on optimizing talent acquisition and driving cost efficiencies for businesses.
key_use_cases: Optimizing talent acquisition for temporary, contract, and freelance workers
Achieving diversity goals within the extended workforce
Streamlining operational and financial aspects of contingent workforce management
Scaling the workforce up or down as needed
Implementing DEI initiatives for the extended workforce
